column4: i have breezer ubuntu and i cant figure out how to upgrade can someone help me
what do you mean of course
no one to help me?
i have breezer ubuntu and i cant figure out how to upgrade can someone help me
oh k
how do i upgrade it?
how the hell do you do that
im new to linux
try sudo update-manager -d
use your user password... NOT a root password
okay try sudo passwd root
download a feisty cd and do a vanilla install then, sorry
what did you just tell me to do?
you should probably download the feisty .iso, burnit and install it that way. okay?
I can give you the link if you want
http://releases.ubuntu.com/7.04/ubuntu-7.04-beta-desktop-i386.iso save that file
that's wht I'm helping you with
most of the time it's alot easier to just reinstall than to upgrade and risk mucking things up
you DONT want to use a root password with ubuntu, use the "sudo" command instead
sounds to me like you've forgotten your password...
provided you dont forget it, yes
is the caps lock on?
good luck changing the password if you've forgotten the one for sudo...
